content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO


	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [sample01_storageazuredemo2023_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://sample01@storageazuredemo2023.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Demo_tbl (
	[col1] nvarchar(4000),
	[col2] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'abc/datafiles/dbo.tbl1.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [sample01_storageazuredemo2023_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Demo_tbl
GO
